title: Warming spiced apple chutney
ingredients: ['7 medium eating apples, peeled, cored and quartered', '300g granulated sugar', '3 cloves', '1 teaspoon grated root ginger', '1/4 teaspoon star anise powder', '1/4 teaspoon ground fennel seeds', '1 pinch of ground cardamom', '1 pinch of salt', '1 teaspoon dried red chilli flakes, or more to taste']
